bonus.value: When a target is being healed, their volt ATK is increased by 8%/10%/12%/15% for 20 seconds. This effect does not stack, and only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

When healing yourself or your Electrode, the target of healing gains a charge of "Lightning." The next attack within 30 seconds will cast Lightning, dealing volt damage equal to 240%/300%/360%/420% of volt ATK on the first target hit, and damage caused by Electrodes is reduced by 50%. Cannot be triggered more than once in 10 seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

mind.name: 合金细胞
mind.desc: 船体被替换的零件远超过了半数，灵魂的占比如何计量呢？

memory.name: 小熊玩偶
memory.desc: 已经失去两个可以回去的家了，好在还有东西自始至终没弄丢。

belief.name: 焕然
belief.desc: 天真的部分被磨损而去，那份勇气看起来更显成熟、锃亮。

emotion.name: 心之引擎
emotion.desc: 作为人类的回忆与心，可能成为绊脚石，也可能会成为强劲的推动力。
